name: Escape From Arth
overview: Take control of one of the cyborgs Voto & Veti who have become TRAPPED on an alien planet inhabited by deadly ROBOT FLYING OBJECTS! Use your wits, cunning (and a handy laser blaster!) and brand new SUPER-JETPAC to defeat your robotic foes. Upgrade your weaponry with power-ups and reveal more locations on the mysterious planet by using switches to deactivate the generators. Your mission: ESCAPE FROM ARTH.
